title: Impeachment Update & Brexit Talks
itunes:title: Impeachment Update & Brexit Talks
description:
Kevin spoke with Miranda Green, Congressional reporter at The Hill and Ben Schreckinger, National Political Correspondent at Politico. They discussed the latest developments in Trump's impeachment battle.

Kevin also spoke with Alexandra Phillips, MEP for the Brexit Party representing South East England, to discuss the latest on Brexit and her response to Pelosi's comments 1998 Good Friday Agreement, which ended the Northern Ireland conflict and created a demilitarized border between Ireland and Northern Ireland.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Kevin spoke with Miranda Green, Congressional reporter at The Hill and Ben Schreckinger, National Political Correspondent at Politico. They discussed the latest developments in Trump's impeachment battle.

Kevin also spoke with Alexandra Phillips, MEP for the Brexit Party representing South East England, to discuss the latest on Brexit and her response to Pelosi's comments 1998 Good Friday Agreement, which ended the Northern Ireland conflict and created a demilitarized border between Ireland and Northern Ireland.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:author: Bloomberg
